chart_description: The Average Service Time chart displays the average time taken by the disk to service a single operation in milliseconds. This is a critical metric in diagnosing issues with disk I/O performance, as high values indicate that the disk is taking a long time to retrieve or store data.

dimension_descriptions.svctm: The dimension `svctm` refers to the average service time of the disk, measured in milliseconds. This dimension is the key metric for this chart and is useful in diagnosing I/O performance issues.
